meanings.definition: A unit of electric current equal to one billion amperes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the electricity in abamperes.
meanings.sent2: The abamperes flowing through the wire were dangerously high.
meanings.sent3: The abamperes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest current.
meanings.sent4: The abamperes surged through the circuit like a powerful river.
meanings.sent5: The bright sparks danced with the intensity of a billion abamperes.
